defaults.identifier_type: # default identifier_type for a given country IFSC for IN, SWIFT for Singapore etc..

details.name: # Offical Full Name of the bank
details.short_code: # Short code of the bank typically 4 letters

branches.code: # branch code of a specific branch would be typically 4-5 chars
branches.city: # City where the bank branch resides

identifiers.swift_code: # SWIFT code of the bank branch
identifiers.routing_number: # Routing number of the bank branch
